alert.note: Alert for Ballard (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 7:48PM EST until March 14 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Kentucky...Missouri... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. .The Ohio River is forecast to crest at Olmsted and Cairo Thursday morning. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam, and Cairo... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 39.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 39.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday evening. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
